title: Ep182 Yakuza Crimes
description: This week, the gals brush up on their Japanese to discuss a global syndicate with a criminal background. Topics include a caste system with far-reaching consequences, one very questionable suicide, and a cleanup crew with dirty hands. Pour yourself a glass of Hakutsuru Sayuri Nigori Sake, mind your manners, and tune in for Yakuza Crimes. Â  For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
